body:
Comment 8: 
I don't think that's the right place to fix it.
I have been thinking about this and I will
probably add a compiler flag -p x/y/z
that means 'just so you know, I'm probably
going to install this as x/y/z, so if you see
any imports of x/y/z, complain.'

The Makefile can take care of passing the flag.

Russ
